About Me

Always excited to learn and implement new technologies.

BIO

I have a strong passion for Web Development and I am studying tirelessly to get my foot in the door within the industry, where I know I will flourish and become an indispensable developer for any business. I have a particular appreciation for the MERN stack, but I am also very flexible and eager to broaden my knowledge outside of this. I am extremely dedicated and hardworking and this is reflected in my work.

My Journey

How I got to where I am today.

I previously studied Programming and Software Development at TAFE and then made the transition to becoming a Production Operator at GMH for 7 years until the closure of the company. It gave me the opportunity to make the change back to doing what I really love, which is Web Development. I’ve recently returned from spending 8 months abroad living and traveling throughout South Korea with my partner. It was such a culturally amazing experience of a lifetime and something I thoroughly enjoyed. Now, upon returning to Australia I’m taking the time to hone my skills in the fine art of Web Development. I’ve completed multiple Udemy and freeCodeCamp courses to add to my previously acquired knowledge from TAFE. I’m currently looking to begin my career as a Front-End developer and build my skills enough to become a Full-Stack developer.

My Plan

My development future.

Currently studying 40-50 hours a week from home towards an initial goal of landing a Front-End developer position. Once I achieve this goal I will continue to study outside of work to really cement my skills to become a very well-rounded Full-Stack developer. I will strive to be the best developer I can be and will always be eager to learn new things. One day I hope to be in a senior role with a wealth of knowledge and experience helping new developers achieve their goals.
